svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.2.5 Chrome/138.0.7204.251 Electron/37.6.1 Safari/537.36" version="28.2.5"> <diagram id="I4PjH-JuyReHY4hu3ilD" name="第 1 页"> <mxGraphModel dx="1090" dy="993" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-2" value="Follower" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="360" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="owW0Dwt-DV2BevSVPwQ_-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-2" target="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="70" y="370" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="30" y="310" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="owW0Dwt-DV2BevSVPwQ_-9" value="1.当 Leader 没有响应时 Follower 会转变成 Candidate 并发起选举" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="owW0Dwt-DV2BevSVPwQ_-7"> <mxGeometry x="-0.175" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="9" y="1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-4" value="Candidate" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="200" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="owW0Dwt-DV2BevSVPwQ_-8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-4" target="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-150" y="220" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-100" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="owW0Dwt-DV2BevSVPwQ_-10" value="2.当 Candidate 发起选举并以最多票通过时就升级为 Leader<div><br></div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="owW0Dwt-DV2BevSVPwQ_-8"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0875" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jTvBcOizdrhotga1Hbb7-1" value="Leader" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="40" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 109px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 289px; margin-left: 159px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

div.div: 1.当 Leader 没有响应时 Follower 会转变成 Candidate 并发起选举

switch.text: 1.当 Leader 没有响应时 Follower 会转变成 Candidate 并发起选举

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 200px; margin-left: 109px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 124px; margin-left: 147px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

div.div: 2.当 Candidate 发起选举并以最多票通过时就升级为 Leader

switch.text: 2.当 Candidate 发起选举并以最多票通过时就升级为 Leader

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 109px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
